text: The 2007 Men's EuroHockey Nations Challenge I was the 2nd edition of the EuroHockey Nations Challenge I, the third level of the European field hockey championships organized by the European Hockey Federation. It was held from 9 to 15 September of 2007 in Kazan, Russia. The tournament also served as a qualifier for the 2009 Men's EuroHockey Nations Trophy, with the top two teams, Russia and Belarus, qualifying. ==Qualified teams== The following six teams, shown with pre-tournament world rankings, competed in the tournament. {| class=wikitable !Dates !Event !Location !Quotas !Qualifiers |- |11—17 September 2005 |2005 EuroHockey Nations Trophy |Rome, Italy |align=center|2 | (45) (46) |- |11–17 September 2005 |2005 EuroHockey Challenge I |Vinnitsya, Ukraine |align=center|2 | (47) ~~~~ ~~~~ (49) |- |5–10 September 2005 |2005 EuroHockey Challenge II |Paola, Malta |align=center|2 | (48) (50) |- !colspan="3"|Total !6 ! |} ==Results== All times are local (UTC+2). ===Preliminary round=== ====Pool A==== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Final standings== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center;" |- !Rank !!|Team |-bgcolor=bbf3bb |Image:Gold medal icon.svg |align=left| |-bgcolor=bbf3bb |Image:Silver medal icon.svg |align=left| |- |Image:Bronze medal icon.svg |align=left| |- |4 |align=left| |- |5 |align=left| |- |6 |align=left| |} Promoted to the EuroHockey Nations Trophy ==References== Category:EuroHockey Championship III Category:International field hockey competitions hosted by Russia Men 3 EuroHockey Championship III Men EuroHockey Championship III Men Category:Sport in Kazan Category:21st century in Kazan
